description: A suggestion that nicotine might help against coronavirus sparks a run on such products.
title: Coronavirus: France bans online sales of nicotine products
title_page: Coronavirus: France bans online sales of nicotine products - BBC News
maintext: The aim is to stop people putting too much nicotine into their bodies, in the hope of protecting themselves against coronavirus, and also to protect the supply for people who need it, says the BBC's Lucy Williamson in Paris.
